task.title: Create a Patch Between Two Repository Revisions

keywords.indexterm: SVN ClientSVN branches/tagscreate patch - from repository

taskbody.context: When a patch must include the differences between two repository revisions, in the same repository or in two different repositories, the steps for creating the patch are the following:

step.cmd: Go to menu Tools Create patch .
step.stepresult: This opens the Create patch wizard: The Create Patch Wizard - Patch Type

step.cmd: Select the second option in the dialog.

step.stepresult: The second step of the wizard is opened: The Create Patch Wizard - Step 2

step.cmd: Select the first repository revision in the From panel.
Select the second repository revision in the To panel.
step.info: For both revisions you have the option of choosing between the HEAD revision and a specific revision number. For a specific number you should press the History button to display a list of the repository revisions.
